Html: How to draw Ellipse with XY coordinates on chart plotter?

I know this is an old post but it might be helpful to someone else.

 

ChartPlotter Plot = new ChartPlotter;


Ellipse e = new Ellipse();
e.Fill = Brushes.LightGray;
ellipseContainer = new PositionalViewportUIContainer();
ellipseContainer.Position = new Point(1, 1);

ellipseContainer.Content = e;
ellipseContainer.MinWidth = totalwidth;
ellipseContainer.MinHeight = totalheight;

Plot.Children.Add(ellipseContainer);
